title: Belkin SoundForm Isolate Bluetooth Over-Ear Headphones - Hybrid Active Noise Cancelling Headphones - Wireless w/ 60H Playtime, Fast Charging & CloudCushion Ear Cups for Travel, Home, or Office - Sand
description: The Belkin SoundForm Isolate Noise Cancelling Over-Ear Headphones are your perfect solution for comfortable all-day audio. Providing 60 hours of battery life with hybrid active noise cancellation, these headphones reduce ambient noise by up to 25 dB. With Bluetooth 5.4 and Multipoint connection, you’ll enjoy a smooth, 33ft range and can connect two devices simultaneously. Choose between three listening modes, including Belkin Signature Sound, ANC, and Hear Thru for various environments. The unique Isolate mode offers calming ocean wave sounds for relaxation, while the USB-C fast charging, 3.5mm compatibility, and foldable CloudCushion ear cups deliver comfort and convenience. Made with recycled materials and covered by a 2-year warranty, Isolate is a sustainable and versatile choice.   *ANC Off = 60+H; ANC On = 40H   **10 minutes of charging yields 6hrs of playtime   ***Quality assured with 150 performance and safety tests; made with post-consumer recycled materials (43.81% total aggregate)   Belkin is an established accessories market leader creating high-quality, innovative tech solutions for 40 years.

Dimensions: 18.7cm x 16.8cm x 8.2cm Acoustic: 40mm driver Microphones: 5 (2x FF ANC, 2x FB ANC, 1x ENC Mic)​ Connection: Bluetooth 5.4 Bluetooth Multipoint Play TIme: 60hrs Frequency Response: 20Hz-20kHz USB-C charging, 4LED indicator Compatibility: Apple iPhone 16 Series, iPhone 15 Series, iPhone 14 Series, iPhone 13 Series, iPhone 12 Series, Samsung Galaxy S24 Series, Galaxy S23 Series, Galaxy S22 Series, Google Pixel 9, Google Pixel 8, Google Pixel 7, iPad Pro, Tablet, MacBook Pro, and more Bluetooth compatible devices Made with PCR materials (43.81% total aggregate) and 100% plastic free packaging 2-year limited warranty
SoundForm Isolate Headphones USB-C charging and audio cable 3.5mm AUX audio cable
